name: 蔡佳玟
objective:
設計心理學旨在於了解設計心理學理論，以及以使用者為中心之設計。課程包含現代心理學基本概念與原則，及人類情緒的互動、認知與感知和產品設計之關係。此外，學生需了解如何將理論實際應用於產品設計上。
On completion of this course students should have an understanding of design psychology theory and user-centered design. The course includes the basic principles of modern psychology and concepts, interaction of emotion with cognition and perception. In addition, students should be able to understand the theories of these applications in product design.
schedule:
一：Course Introduction
二：Norman Psychology
三：The relationship between design and cognitive psychology
四：Modeling psychology
五：Color psychology
六：The relationship between users, products and the environment
七：User-centered design
八：Psychology of Everyday Objects/Usability and Understandability
九：Mid-term Presentation
十：Emotional and Metaphorical design
十一：Human-centered design /User Experience
十二：Universal Design and Service Design
十三：Social Design and Circular Economy
十四：Practical - Explore the Topic, observation and mind map
十五：Practical - design planning and discussion
十六：Practical - Empathy Interviews and user test
十七：Practical -Discussion and Prepare the results
十八：Final Presentation
scorePolicy:
Course assignment, Class Participation, and Attendance: 30%
Mid-term Presentation: 30%
Final Presentation: 40%
materials:
Self-made materials.
The Design of Everyday Things by Don Norman, 2017.
